# The `SCCIterator.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This builds on the <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/graphtraits-h">llvm/ADT/GraphTraits.h</a> file to find the strongly connected components (SCCs) of a graph in O(N+E) time using Tarjan&#39;s DFS algorithm. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This builds on the <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/graphtraits-h">llvm/ADT/GraphTraits.h</a> file to find the strongly connected components (SCCs) of a graph in O(N+E) time using Tarjan&#39;s DFS algorithm.

The SCC iterator has the important property that if a node in SCC S1 has an edge to a node in SCC S2, then it visits S1 <em>after</em> S2.

To visit S1 <em>before</em> S2, use the scc&#95;iterator on the Inverse graph. (NOTE: This requires some simple wrappers and is not supported yet.)

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A full SCC is on the SCCNodeStack!  It includes all nodes below</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Construct the begin iterator for a deduced graph type T.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3c1a67796e24a843db8a6766baa54c21"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator">scc&#95;iterator&lt;T&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3c1a67796e24a843db8a6766baa54c21">scc&#95;begin</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator/#a430e6f48731308238761ee98c4d57eba">scc&#95;iterator&lt;T&gt;::begin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Construct the end iterator for a deduced graph type T.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab538c5d036c618405f9bffe1b3a6955f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator">scc&#95;iterator&lt;T&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab538c5d036c618405f9bffe1b3a6955f">scc&#95;end</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator/#a915adc49283d43ff7e7d622ecb2f417e">scc&#95;iterator&lt;T&gt;::end</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Sort the nodes of a directed SCC in the decreasing order of the edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// weights. The instantiating GraphT type should have weighted edge type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// declared in its graph traits in order to use this iterator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is implemented using Kruskal&#39;s minimal spanning tree algorithm followed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// by Kahn&#39;s algorithm to compute a topological order on the MST. First a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// maximum spanning tree (forest) is built based on all edges within the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// collection. Then a topological walk is initiated on tree nodes that do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// have a predecessor and then applied to all nodes of the SCC. Such order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ensures that high-weighted edges are visited first during the traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GT = GraphTraits&lt;GraphT&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#a4fe79a1a958cfcba4ab5f27fbf602335">scc&#95;member&#95;iterator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodeType = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GT::NodeType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">EdgeType = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GT::EdgeType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodesType = std::vector&lt;NodeType &#42;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Auxilary node information used during the MST calculation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodeInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeInfo &#42;Group = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t Rank = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Visited = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;const EdgeType &#42;&gt;</a> IncomingMSTEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the root group of the node and compress the path from node to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodeInfo &#42;find(NodeInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Group != <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Group = find(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Group);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Group;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Union the source and target node into the same group and return true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns false if they are already in the same group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> unionGroups(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeType &#42;Edge) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeInfo &#42;G1 = find(&amp;NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Source&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeInfo &#42;G2 = find(&amp;NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Target&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the edge forms a cycle, do not add it to MST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G1 == G2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make the smaller rank tree a direct child of high rank tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G1-&gt;Rank &lt; G2-&gt;Rank)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      G1-&gt;Group = G2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      G2-&gt;Group = G1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the ranks are the same, increment root of one tree by one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G1-&gt;Rank == G2-&gt;Rank)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        G1-&gt;Rank++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unordered&#95;map&lt;NodeType &#42;, NodeInfo&gt; NodeInfoMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodesType Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#a4fe79a1a958cfcba4ab5f27fbf602335">scc&#95;member&#95;iterator</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodesType &amp;InputNodes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#ae661b91140ced1f47ba8e1990969a6ed"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodesType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#ae661b91140ced1f47ba8e1990969a6ed">operator&#42;</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#a4fe79a1a958cfcba4ab5f27fbf602335"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-member-iterator/#a4fe79a1a958cfcba4ab5f27fbf602335">scc&#95;member&#95;iterator&lt;GraphT, GT&gt;::scc&#95;member&#95;iterator</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodesType &amp;InputNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InputNodes.size() &lt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes = InputNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize auxilary node information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodeInfoMap.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : InputNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is specifically used to construct a &#96;NodeInfo&#96; object in place. An</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert operation will involve a copy construction which invalidate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initial value of the &#96;Group&#96; field which should be &#96;this&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)NodeInfoMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#93;.Group;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort edges by weights.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">EdgeComparer &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> operator()(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeType &#42;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeType &#42;R)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> L-&gt;Weight &gt; R-&gt;Weight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::multiset&lt;const EdgeType &#42;, EdgeComparer&gt; SortedEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : InputNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeInfoMap.count(Edge.Target))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SortedEdges.insert(&amp;Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse all the edges and compute the Maximum Weight Spanning Tree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using Kruskal&#39;s algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unordered&#95;set&lt;const EdgeType &#42;&gt; MSTEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Edge : SortedEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (unionGroups(Edge))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MSTEdges.insert(Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run Kahn&#39;s algorithm on MST to compute a topological traversal order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm starts from nodes that have no incoming edge. These nodes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;roots&quot; of the MST forest. This ensures that nodes are visited before their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// descendants are, thus ensures hot edges are processed before cold edges,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on how MST is computed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::queue&lt;NodeType &#42;&gt; Queue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Edge : MSTEdges)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Target&#93;.IncomingMSTEdges.insert(Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk through SortedEdges to initialize the queue, instead of using NodeInfoMap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to ensure an ordered deterministic push.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Edge : SortedEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Source&#93;.Visited &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Source&#93;.IncomingMSTEdges.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Queue.push(Edge-&gt;Source);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeInfoMap&#91;Edge-&gt;Source&#93;.Visited = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Queue.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = Queue.front();</span></CodeLine>
